mapper.insert:
insert into t_merchant_cabinet_bind_history (merchant_id, cabinet_id, place_id,start_time,end_time , place_fee ,calculate_month,tenant_id ,status ,create_time ,update_time) values
(#{item.merchantId}, #{item.cabinetId}, #{item.placeId}, #{item.startTime}, #{item.endTime}, #{item.placeFee},#{item.calculateMonth},#{item.tenantId},#{item.status},#{item.createTime},#{item.updateTime})
